name: PressCode
author: PressBits

sections.description:
PressCode provides the best and easiest way to add custom code to your WordPress site… without the need for cumbersome plugin creation. While targeted at developers this plugin aims to simplify the process of writing code for your site by allowing code to be written directly from within WP Admin.

Key Features

  • Add code to your website from directly within WP Admin
  • Support for common WordPress development languages
  • Capture revisions of your code with support for rolling back to previous versions
  • Include custom CSS and JS on only specific pages/posts
  • Easy to use
  • FREE! ðŸ˜€

Supported Languages

  • CSS
  • JavaScript
  • PHP
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Install and activate the required plugin dependencies when prompted
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Install and activate the required plugin dependencies when prompted

Which languages are supported?

PressCode supports the addition of CSS, JavaScript and PHP to your WordPress site.
